author: st_pete305
title: Useful
review:
I have purchased a total of (8) of this set. Lego has scaled up the door size to 6 brick unit wide and 6 brick units tall. Like other "Designer Sets", the set does not come with any mini-figures. 

Overall, this set is very useful if you are a fan of the Town/City collection.

author: phoinix
title: big doors old trees
review: this set contains 4 big doors and 10 windows that look a LOT like the old fabuland ones..it also has 2 old style trees (and thats very good) and 2 bushes..also has many roof tiles and other bricks.. i think its cute but the doors and windows are a bit useless for me..the box is very usefull and you can store more in it..a good parts pack

author: omgbrick
title: Too many doors and windows!
review: I found this and thought that it would be a good set to get some pieces but was disapointed to find tat there were 10 door frames and ten windows what kind of house has ten doors. Another bad thing about it is that it doesn't have instructios too build homes. Now onto the positives it does have two bushs and two evergreen trees which are great for putting in yard s looks of roofing tiles and some base plates along with lots of white pieces. A minifig and some pices for the interor would also be nice for the set.

author: bsmarthen
title: ok but not great
review: This is an ok set. Nothing really stands out with this. The windows and doors are kind of cartoonish. You get some nice pieces in here but not much. Its good just for parts you really cant build a good model with just this one set.
